example.text: Today, my Republican colleagues are ramming through a faux immigration and border security package that would criminalize small businesses across the country and drive our economy to a standstill. It’s not just economically misguided—it’s morally reprehensible. [[url]]

Title 42 is no more. But are we prepared for what’s next? I joined [[user]] to discuss what more we should be doing—to mitigate the effects, and ensure our immigration system is efficient and humane. [[url]]

This week, we honor our public safety officers across Orange County, and around the country, who fight tirelessly to protect our communities. Thank you for all you do to keep our families safe—and I won't stop fighting for more federal funding to ensure that you can do that job. [[url]]

This faux immigration and border security bill does nothing to support frontline officers, protect immigrant families, or deliver on our promise to immigrant veterans. I submitted amendments to deliver for them. And I’m making my case to the Rules Committee right now. [[url]]

“US policies must press for the freedoms and rights desired by the overwhelming majority of the Vietnamese people, not support the privileged elite of the Communist Party who too often get away with egregious human rights violations.” Historically, ? ?the Caucus has served as a bipartisan hub of members focused on bilateral United States-Vietnam relations, including conversations regarding human, religious, and political rights violations.
